name: Leg Day (Codster177)
description:
Your gym session got ruined by a bunch of zombies? Not cool bro. Its time to get up and work those legs as you demolish those zombies with your massive arms. No one disturbs the pump ever again.

This game didn't really get far enough to include everything I wanted, or really the story that was going to go along with the theme; but hey, its a game! Maybe not the best one, but I'm not too disappointed for only having a week and staying up until 6 am. 

Once the game jams over I plan to add all of the stuff that didn't make it into the game, but for now I appreciate any feedback and let me know whether you thought it was ok or a garbage fire.

Credits: 

Cody Taylor - All coding, modeling, and designing.

Kai Ford - All of the super sick music and sound effects.

Melanie Najera - The super cool thumbnail and for putting up with my shit.

This game was made in under a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. Don't forget to rate the game!
